name: Ships.io Warships Battle
description:
We proudly present you our new game “Ship.io”! Ship.io is an ultimate action arcade game with a top down perspective set in World War II.

Welcome to the biggest naval battle! The goal of this game is to control a military boat around a colored area, destroy other war ships and shapes for higher score and upgrades.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the left controller for the ship driving. Use the right controller to reset the turret's position.

Game features:
-action game free
-minimalist ship models
-simple but addictive gameplay
-navy war ship battles

Enjoy yourself with Ship.io! Let's fight for our last land – there is life in the old dog yet!
